EmailTemplate.name: W: A Match has automatically been confirmed as the YPPG cannot attend a PIE
EmailTemplate.subject: SW: A Match has automatically been confirmed as the YPPG cannot attend a PIE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
As {!Contact.Name} is unable to attend the PIE the match has automatically been confirmed. Please ensure that {!Contact.Name} is aware.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever the YPPG is unable to attend the PIE.
